attributes.action: Stop the Euro zone BIAL OUT and FOREIGN AID SPENDING
attributes.additional_details:
Why does the PM think when his own Country is cutting Public Jobs and Services it would be a good idea to throw money to the Euro Zone! and to (increase) Foreign Aid. - when is the UK tax payer ever going to see a return!

Most of these countries that HM Government is giving money to are richer they the UK- some who have a space program and others how have oil, coal and diamonds

My e-Petition is to Stop the bail out of the Euro Zone and to at least reduce the spending on foreign aid until the UK has all people of working age back to work.
